EmailTemplate.name: MHP-EmailTemplate_Password_Email_German_Romanian_Inernal_Users
EmailTemplate.Body:
Good day,

welcome also from MHP-IT.
With this letter we inform you about your access data.

You can log in to your MHP notebook with the following access data:

Initial-Password: PASSWORD

More information about passwords can be found on the SharePoint at the following link: https://mhpcloud.sharepoint.com/sites/1048/SitePages/FAQ.aspx
If you have any questions about setting up your hardware, please contact the StarterDays hotline.
Phone: +49 7141 7856 200 22 To a good and successful cooperation.

With best regards
Your MHP-IT
EmailTemplate.Subject: Password Email for German, Romanian and Internal Users
